attributes.action: give all schools the same security as the religious schools in Gateshead
attributes.additional_details: Statistics show that Christian and non religious schools in the local area are more at risk than those who follow a religion. This is prejudice at the highest level the local MP is guilty of inequitable behaviour
attributes.background: The Jewish community have an extraordinary amount of security included security guards and CCTV on every corner as do the Muslim community. This is not equality and everyone should be treat fairly regardless of religious views.

rejection.details: Security arrangements at schools in Gateshead are not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament.
